content: spiral hat free pattern with purchase of suggested yarn us6 16″ circular needle mochi plus color intense rainbow cast on 60 stitches for a baby hat join in the round…you know the drill…make sure the stitches aren t twisted knit 4 row this will make the edge will roll up here comes the trick don t bother marking the start of the round just yarn over knit 2 together…until the hat is the height you want then k2tog until you have about 7 or 8 stitches left cut the yarn and weave through the last remaining stitches cinch up and weave in ends easy peasy darnknitanyway com - 423 s main street stillwater mn 55082 - 651-342-1386
